name: Power Down (Digx7, TranZience, C00l C0DER STUDI0S, Randomtrexx)
name_original: Power Down (Digx7, TranZience, C00l C0DER STUDI0S, Randomtrexx)
description:
GAMEPLAY

Player is a spaceship that is struggling to survive in space by fighting off enemies. Every wave is the same, but after beating a wave, the player is given X choice to downgrade, leading to eventual loss. Goal is to survive as many waves as possible.

(Download for the best experience)

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

CREDITS

Programmer - Digx7

Artists - C00l C0der - Samblez

Musicians - Noland The (Musician) Goose - zig zag
